name: HKUpdateFrequency
desc: Constants that determine how often the system will launch your app in response to changes to HealthKit data.

items.name: case immediate
items.desc: The system launches your app every time it detects a change.

items.name: case hourly
items.desc: The system launches your app at most once an hour in response to changes.

items.name: case daily
items.desc: The system launches your app at most once a day in response to changes.

items.name: case weekly
items.desc: The system launches your app at most once per week in response to changes.
